sign-in.title: Login to Account
sign-in.sub-title: Please enter your email and password to continue
sign-in.incorrect-value: Password or Email address is incorrect. Try again

error.min: Password must contain more than 8 characters
error.max: Password must be no longer than 25 characters
error.invalide: Password must contain 1 upper case letter, 1 lower case letter, 1 numeric digit

forgot-password.title: Forgot password?
forgot-password.sub-title: Please enter your email address to reset your password.

change-password.title: Change password
change-password.sub-title: Enter new password and code you received in the email to change your password.

error.min: New password must contain more than 8 characters
error.max: New password must be no longer than 25 characters
error.invalide: New password must contain 1 upper case letter, 1 lower case letter, 1 numeric digit

code.title: Code
code.placeholder: Enter the code you received in the mail

change-password.resend-code-btn-title: Didn't receive a code? Click to resend.

successful-password-reset.title: Successfully changed
successful-password-reset.sub-title: Your password has been changed - please login to your profile using your credentials.
